---
title: "git_provided_with_directory.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines storage settings for a Git-based storage system. It specifies the storage type as "git" and provides details about the Git repository, including the repository URL and a specific directory within the repository.

## Symbols

### `storage`
#### Description
The `storage` key is the root-level configuration object that contains settings related to the storage system.

#### Internal Logic
The `storage` object has two nested keys: `type` and `git`, which define the storage type and Git-specific configuration, respectively.

___

### `storage.type`
#### Description
Specifies the type of storage system to be used.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| type | string | The type of storage system, set to "git" in this case |

___

### `storage.git`
#### Description
Contains Git-specific configuration settings for the storage system.

#### Internal Logic
The `git` object has two nested keys: `repository` and `directory`, which provide details about the Git repository to be used for storage.

___

### `storage.git.repository`
#### Description
Specifies the URL of the Git repository to be used for storage.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| repository | string | The Git repository URL in SSH format |

___

### `storage.git.directory`
#### Description
Specifies a specific directory within the Git repository to be used for storage.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| directory | string | The name of the directory within the Git repository |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| storage.type | string | N/A | Specifies the storage type as "git" |
| storage.git.repository | string | N/A | The Git repository URL in SSH format |
| storage.git.directory | string | N/A | The directory within the Git repository to be used for storage |

Note: This configuration file does not specify default values, so all options are considered required.
